description.value: You expose this reality to a realm of pure darkness filled with gibbering voices and otherworldly entities. The area of your quantum field functions as though it were an area of 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Darkness]. Creatures that begin their turn in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|against:witchwarper] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Confused] for 1 round. Creatures that critically succeed are then immune for 24 hours. If this darkness is successfully counteracted, the quantum field's other effects remain.
